attributes.comment:
I strongly encourage you to reconsider the increase of rates at USCIS.
International adoption is already an expensive endeavor. In fact, most of the
families pursuing international adoption will have to renew their USCIS paperwork
before the process is completed. This means the government is getting twice the
amount of money. I do not see why the rate increase is needed or justified. The
rates are already outrageous. In my opinion, it is unnecessary to charge $545 for
a form and $70 for fingerprints. It would be even more outrageous to increase
these rates. Once again, I ask that you reconsider this rate increase.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
